name: Pwg Cookies by Programación Web Galicia
author: Javier Méndez Veira

sections.description:
Configure the way Google Analytics cookies are loaded on your web page.

Features

  • Personalize the cookies notice and the link to your cookies information page.
  • Add easily your Google Analytics code. In addition, you can choose whether Google Analytics cookies are loaded always or only when the cookies notice is accepted

Documentation

In construction…
Documentation
sections.installation:
1. Upload and install Pwg Cookies in the same way you’d install any other plugin.
  2. Read the usage documentation on Programación Web Galicia.
sections.faq:
Problems with WP Super Cache?

You should uncheck options: is_home and is_front_page to not cache it.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Added preload cookies if the admin activate it. Always load cookies.
  • Fixed error with the name of the cookie, get the name from blog info of WordPress.

1.1

  • Added reload page after accept cookie to load Google Analytics.
